author: _act_
created_time: August 17, 2022, 08:11:17 PMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 09:29:49 PM by _act_
content: Some people thought that the next ethereum merge will reduce bitcoin transaction fee, you can check the few misconceptions circulating around among people but which are actually not true but false. The MergeQuoteMisconception: "The Merge will reduce gas fees."False. The Merge is a change of consensus mechanism, not an expansion of network capacity, and will not result in lower gas fees.QuoteMisconception: "Transactions will be noticeably faster after The Merge."False. Though some slight changes exist, transaction speed will mostly remain the same on layer 1.You can click on the link and read the other misconceptions about the upgrade.
